member.name: T:ContextQuickie.NetExplorerContextMenuEntry
member.summary: This class represents one entry in a context menu.
Constructor which creates the context menu.
member.param: A list of paths for which the context menu will be created.
A value indicating whether the default menu will be loaded or not.
A list of context menu extension CLSIDs which are loaded. If the list is empty, all available extensions are loaded.

member.summary: Loads the extended explorer context menu. The extended menu contains the entris which are specified by shell extensions in the registry.
member.param: A reference to the desktop folder which is used as the parent element for all files/folders.
A list of file system items for which the menu will be created.
The number of items in
A list of context menu extension CLSIDs which are loaded. If the list is empty, all available extensions are loaded.
member.returns: A value indicating whether loading the default context menu was successful or not.

member.summary: Loads the default explorer context menu.

The number of items in
member.returns: A value indicating whether loading the default context menu was successful or not.

member.summary: Removes duplicate separators and the separator at the end (if it exists) from the child entries.

member.summary: Prints the context menu to the console.

member.name: M:ContextQuickie.ExplorerContextMenuEntry.ExecuteCommand(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes the command for this entry.
member.param: A value indicating whether the command is executed synchronously or not. Note that synchronous execution is not supported by all context menu entries.

member.summary: Gets the pixel data of the bitmap image for this entry.
member.param: The image width.
The image height.
The number of planes of the image.
The bits per pixel of the image.
A pointer to the buffer where the image data will be copied to.
member.returns: true if the image data could be retrieved; otherwise false.

member.summary: Gets the dimensions of the bitmap image for this entry.
member.param: Reference to store the image width.
Reference to store the image height.
Reference to store the number of planes of the image.
Reference to store bits per pixel of the image.
member.returns: true if the image data could be retrieved; otherwise false.
